message: Let's start with a fair split, we can always negotiate from here.
You started with a generous offer, now it's my turn to make a more substantial claim!
Let's meet in the middle, it's still early in the game.
I'm not budging on this one, Alice. You can do better than that!
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need to get a better deal to make it worth my while.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not giving up yet!
I'm running out of patience, Bob. I need a better deal to make this worthwhile.
You're getting close to being left with nothing, Alice. Don't make me regret this!
I'm not leaving with nothing, Bob. I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going down without a fight.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you have it all!
I'm not leaving with anything less than I can get. You've had your chance to negotiate, now it's my turn to dictate the terms.
You've had your chance, Alice. I'm taking it all. Game over.
